anar

Class EPlusAirflow.ZoneVentilation

java.lang.Object
  anar.EPlusAirflow.ZoneVentilation
All Implemented Interfaces:
EPlusInterface
Enclosing class:
EPlusAirflow
public class EPlusAirflow.ZoneVentilation
extends java.lang.Object
implements EPlusInterface

class that defines the set amount of air Ventilation in a specific zone
Assumptions:

  • air ventilation rate is constant (or scheduled)
  • the ventilation equation parameters are fixed (TODO allow changes)
  • the possibility of EnergyPlus to condition this ventilation depending on inside and outside temperatures is not available (TODO allow setting min and max temperatures)

Field Summary
static java.lang.String BALANCED
          Ventilation BALANCED: add appropriate fan heat to outside air conditions, assumes exhuast and intake fan and then consumes double amount of electricity
static java.lang.String EXHAUST
          Ventilation EXHAUST: assumes outside air conditions, consumes electricity
static java.lang.String INTAKE
          Ventilation INTAKE (default): add appropriate fan heat to outside air conditions , consumes electricity
static java.lang.String NATURAL
          Ventilation type NATURAL: assumes outside air conditions, consumes no electricity and fan pressure is ignored
